column1: NOTES: Country income status is based upon World Bank classifications described at http://data.worldbank.org/about/country-classifications and available for download at http://siteresources.worldbank.org/DATASTATISTICS/Resources/OGHIST.xls (consulted 1 April, 2014).  Income status varies by country and time.  Where a country's status changed between DHS waves only the most recent status is listed above.  Middle refers to both lower-middle and upper-middle income countries, while low refers just to those considered to be low-income economies.
